message.content:
cs.CR, cs.SE, cs.PL, cs.SY, cs.DC 

This paper deals with the automatic discovery of heap exploitation techniques, which is a topic related to computer security (cs.CR). The paper also presents a tool called ArcHeap, which involves software engineering techniques such as fuzzing and code generation (cs.SE). The paper also discusses the implementation of heap allocators, which is related to programming languages (cs.PL) and systems (cs.SY). Finally, the paper evaluates the tool with custom allocators from the DARPA Cyber Grand Challenge, which is related to distributed computing (cs.DC).
